useEdition.name: useEdition
useEdition.summary: Hook for getting an instance of an `Edition` contract. This contract is used to interface with ERC1155 compliant NFTs.

subhooks.name: useMintNFT
useNFT
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: nft, isLoading, error } = useNFT(contract?.nft, <tokenId>);

subhooks.name: useNFTBalance
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: ownerBalance, isLoading, error } = useNFTBalance(contract?.nft, <OwnerWalletAddress>);

subhooks.name: useNFTs
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: nfts, isLoading, error } = useNFTs(contract?.nft, { start: 0, count: 100 });

subhooks.name: useOwnedNFTs
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: ownedNFTs, isLoading, error } = useOwnedNFTs(contract?.nft, <OwnerWalletAddress>);

subhooks.name: useTotalCirculatingSupply
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: totalSupply, isLoading, error } = useNFTSupply(contract?.nft);

useEditionDrop.name: useEditionDrop
useEditionDrop.summary: Hook for getting an instance of an `EditionDrop` contract. This conract is used to interface with ERC1155 compliant NFTs that can be lazily minted.

subhooks.name: useActiveClaimCondition
subhooks.example: const { data: activeClaimCondition, isLoading, error } = useActiveClaimCondition(<YourERC1155ContractInstance>, <tokenId>);

subhooks.name: useClaimedNFTs
subhooks.example: const { data: claimedNFTs, isLoading, error } = useClaimedNFTs(<YourERC721DropContractInstance>, { start: 0, count: 100 });

subhooks.name: useClaimIneligibilityReasons
subhooks.example: const { data: claimIneligibilityReasons, isLoading, error } = useClaimIneligibilityReasons(<YourERC1155ContractInstance>, {quantity: <quantity>}, <tokenId>);

subhooks.name: useClaimNFT
useMintNFT
useNFT
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: nft, isLoading, error } = useNFT(contract?.nft, <tokenId>);

subhooks.name: useNFTBalance
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: ownerBalance, isLoading, error } = useNFTBalance(contract?.nft, <OwnerWalletAddress>);

subhooks.name: useNFTs
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: nfts, isLoading, error } = useNFTs(contract?.nft, { start: 0, count: 100 });

subhooks.name: useOwnedNFTs
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: ownedNFTs, isLoading, error } = useOwnedNFTs(contract?.nft, <OwnerWalletAddress>);

subhooks.name: useTotalCirculatingSupply
subhooks.example:
const { contract } = useContract(<ContractAddress>);
const { data: totalSupply, isLoading, error } = useNFTSupply(contract?.nft);

subhooks.name: useUnclaimedNFTs
subhooks.example: const { data: unclaimedNfts, isLoading, error } = useUnclaimedNFTs(<YourERC721DropContractInstance>, { start: 0, count: 100 });

useMarketplace.name: useMarketplace
useMarketplace.summary: Hook for getting an instance of a `Marketplace` contract. This contract is used to support marketplace for purchase and sale of on-chain assets.

subhooks.name: useActiveListings
subhooks.example: const { data: listings, isLoading, error } = useMarketplaceListings(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, { seller: "0x...", tokenContract: "0x...", tokenId: 1, start: 0, count: 100 });

subhooks.name: useAuctionWinner
subhooks.example: const { data: auctionWinner, isLoading, error } = useAuctionWinner(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, <listingId>);

subhooks.name: useBidBuffer
subhooks.example: const { data: auctionWinner, isLoading, error } = useAuctionWinner(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, <listingId>);

subhooks.name: useBuyNow
useCreateAuctionListing
useCreateDirectListing
useListing
subhooks.example: const { data: listing, isLoading, error } = useListing(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, <listingId>);

subhooks.name: useListings
subhooks.example: const { data: listings, isLoading, error } = useListings(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, { start: 0, count: 100 });

subhooks.name: useMakeBid
useWinningBid
subhooks.example: const { data: winningBid, isLoading, error } = useWinningBid(<YourMarketplaceContractInstance>, <listingId>);

usePack.name: usePack
usePack.summary: Hook for getting an instance of a `Pack` contract. This contract supports the creation of on-chain luck-based lootboxes.

useSplit.name: useSplit
useSplit.summary: Hook for getting an instance of a `Split` contract. This contract supports fund distribution to multiple parties.

useToken.name: useToken
useToken.summary: Hook for getting an instance of an `Token` contract. This contract supports ERC20 compliant tokens.

subhooks.name: useMintToken
useTokenBalance
subhooks.example: const { data: balance, isLoading, error } = useTokenBalance(<YourTokenContractInstance>);

subhooks.name: useTokenSupply
subhooks.example: const { data: totalSupply, isLoading, error } = useTokenSupply(<YourTokenContractInstance>);

useVote.name: useVote
useVote.summary: Hook for getting an instance of an `Vote` contract. This contract enables fully featured voting-based decentralized governance systems.
